name: 5th and Wine
review description: On Mondays & Tuesdays 5th and Wine offers a date night special menu that is awesome! Filled with items from their regular menu, you can choose two salads, two entrees, and one dessert, all for a very pleasing price! Plus you get $10 off your first bottle of wine. We had Chicken Picata and Hangar Steak, both of which were delicious. Ceasar salad for my hubby and my salad with strawberries and gorgonzola cheese were lovely and very good. Our server was conversational and savvy and wrapped up a huge piece of cheesecake for us to take back to our hotel. We loved the entire evening!

name: Acacia
review description: Wonderful cuisine, great service! A little noisy, but a nice dining experience.

name: Afternoon Tea - The Phoenician
review description: Afternoon tea is almost a thing of the past. Not at the Phoenician where it is still done with bone English china, a great loose tea selection and wonderful ambiance. It has gotten a little pricier than when I first started going however for something special, it is worth it. You leave full and happy.

name: Agave Restaurant at Desert Diamond Casino
address: 1100 West Pima Mine Road Sahuarita, AZ  85629
review description: I was unable to go but the 7 girls who did go enjoyed themselves.

name: Aiello's
review description: I've been here twice and only have good things to say about this place. The food is great, the service is even better.

name: Alchemy Restaurant at Copperwynd Resort
address: 13220 N. Eagle Ridge Drive Fountain Hills, AZ  85268
review description: Excellent service, wonderful view! Food was great. Wonderful evening.

name: Alexi's Grill
address: 3550 N. Central Ave Suite 120 Phoenix, AZ  85012
review description: Our birthday work group loves Alexi's. The waiters are outstanding, very attentive and funny! The food is always high quality. I love your new way of getting reservations also--on line. We have been to this venue many times.

name: Alto Ristorante e Bar
address: 7500 E. Doubletree Ranch Road Hyatt Regency Scottsdale Resort and Spa at Gainey Ranch Scottsdale, AZ  85258
review description: It was just O'kay...Our server was great but messed up twice on our food and added extra drinks to our tab (which is always awkward to point out).

name: Amaro Pizzeria & Vino Lounge
address: 28234 N. Tatum Blvd Cave Creek, AZ  85331
review description: Can be depended on for a fabulous meal!

name: Arizona Grand Resort- The Lobby Grill
address: 8000 S Arizona Grand Pkwy Phoenix, AZ  85044
review description: View is nice. Sandwiches were okay but the fries were soggy and greasy. Was hoping for more but will probably try one more tomr because the location and view from the dining room are so nice.

name: Arizona Inn - Dining Room
review description: It was in my wife's 85th birthday anniversary, and we appreciated the nice touch of a complimentary dessert. We also liked the considerate manner of our server. It wasn't AZInn's fault tat the next table was loud.

name: Armitage Bistro
address: 20751 N. Pima Road Suite 120 Scottsdale, AZ  85255
review description: Service was great. We shared a bunch of appetisers during happy hour and loved all of them!

name: Armitage Wine Lounge & Cafe
address: 2905 E. Skyline Drive Suite 168 Tucson, AZ  85718
review description: We tried several dishes the Halibut, Beef Medallions, Lamb, and Chicken. All dishes tasted very good.

name: Arrivederci Ristorante
review description: Excellent service. The food is always good there, portions just right.

name: Arrivederci Trattoria
review description: Outstanding food with very good service. Came an hour before close and staff was pleasant and attentive. Wine list was quite good, with prices reflective of that quality. In fact, all prices here are h higher than you may be expecting. The food is worth it.

name: The Arrogant Butcher
review description: The food was very good, and prepared correctly. The restaurant was very loud, which made conversation difficult at times.

name: Arrowhead Grill
address: 8280 West Union Hills Road Suite 110 Glendale, AZ  85308
review description: Very romantic atmosphere with mellow music. The decor is soothing, the food is gourmet,and the service was very attentive and professional.

name: Athena Greek Cuisine
review description: Very friendly reception. Waiter was very helpful and informative.

name: Au Petit Four
review description: The food is simple, classic French cuisine. The quality is very good, and the service personable. A good place in Scottsdale to go for something different. The pastries are delicious!

name: Avanti
review description: Avanti's has been a noticeable part of the Phoenix Restaurant scene for as long as we can remember. One of our favorite special spots years ago we had not had much contact withAvanti for some years. Still a class place with menu selections and quality that is among the best you can find.

name: Azul Restaurant and Lounge
review description: What I love is that Azul is always consistent never lets you down. You always get the best, great service, great food, friendly people. Love going there. Wish it was closer to Sahuarita.

name: Bamboo Club - Scottsdale
review description: The Bamboo Club offers very good food at a very reasonable price. Great neighborhood restaurant.

name: Beckett's Table
address: 3717 E. Indian School Rd. Phoenix, AZ  85018
review description: Excellent experience however they seemed to be "out" of a fair amount of key items on the menu. After our server rattled of 4-5 items that we could not order, I chose the green chile pork stew...and was told after my order that they were out of Corn bread...a key component of their "Homestyle food". We dined at 7:30 on a Saturday. Not 9pm.

name: Bella Luna - Goodyear
address: 14175 West Indian School Rd. Goodyear, AZ  85395
review description: The meal was mediocre at best but the service decent.

name: Benihana - Chandler
review description: My boyfriend and I have a tradition of going to Benihana together on our birthdays. The restaurant never disappoints. The food and service are excellent and Benihana is the perfect place for an intimate dinner with your loved ones. Also, I hadn't previously thought of it, but there was a group across from us with a 5 year old. Benihana is also the perfect place to take children; they offer a kids menu and the showmanship of the chef is sure to amaze!

name: Benihana - Scottsdale
review description: Overall very nice experience. The chain has become the place to go for special occasions and groups. I would recommend when making reservations to requst a seating without children. For our dining almost all tables had children, which can impact the experience.

name: Betty's Nosh
review description: Grilled cheese was supposed to have four kinds of cheese - it had 3x american cheese and Gouda... Reminded me of Denny's.

name: Binkley's Restaurant
address: 6920 E. Cave Creek Rd. Cave Creek, AZ  85331
review description: I enjoyed talking to the staff and the chef.

name: Bistro 24 at the Ritz-Carlton Phoenix
review description: truly enjoyed my dad's dining with my children.Well done Chef Harris!!!! And servers Vicki & Dannon!!!

name: Black Angus Steakhouse - Arrowhead
review description: We were visiting and had a great experience.

name: Black Angus Steakhouse - Chandler
review description: once again we were not disappointed

name: Black Angus Steakhouse - Goodyear
review description: We took my 9 year old for his birthday to Black Angus, Goodyear, As always, our server Roy was excellent. Everyone from the hostess, to the manager and bus boy were all friendly. Enjoyed it very much. I'm sure we will be back for the next birthday celebration!

name: Black Angus Steakhouse - Phoenix Metro
review description: Food was prepared as ordered and served promptly. Tasted good. Coffee was excellent.

name: Black Angus Steakhouse - Superstition
review description: The food was excellent, the waiter was not real welcoming and friendly, she asked us if we needed anything and when my husband asked for steak sauce she never returned it. it doesn't matter we like the restaurant and we will return. thank you this is the second time we have had this same waitress and she was not friendly last time either. thank you

name: Black Chile Mexican Grill
review description: Interesting menu - definitely a cut above the typical Mexican restaurant. Great margaritas!

name: BLT Steak at Camelback Inn, A JW Marriott Resort
review description: we have been to BLT a few times, but this was the first thru open table, we love BLT, our experience has been wonderful, the people that serve you are very nice, we will go back many times.

name: Blue Adobe Grille
address: 10885 N. Frank Lloyd Wright Blvd. Scottsdale, AZ  85259
review description: Loved the food and live music, perfect night.

name: Blue Hound Kitchen & Cocktails
review description: I was in Phoenix on business and this is exactly the kind of place I like to seek out when I travel. The space is modern with clean lines and generally dark colors, but not over the top. Our waiter was knowledgeable and attentive and didn't try to steer us in any particular direction on food choices. My friend and I shared several small plates and absolutely everything was perfectly prepared without being over the top. The pork belly sopes were a particular favorite of mine, but kudos to the kitchen on prepping perfect roasted asparagus-- harder than it sounds. The bar didn't disappoint either, with nicely prepared, well-balanced cocktails. Mixology is fashionable again, thankfully, and this bar knows how to do it right.

name: Blue Sage @ JW Marriott Desert Ridge Resort & Spa
review description: The hotel is gorgeous as you walk in, but the restaurant looks cheap and not suitable for a 5 star resort.Service was ok, not Marriott standards service, by no means. We saw one of the servers asking a guest many times to remove her luggage, so he could clean around her. He actually moved one of her tables so he could clean the floor. In a 5 star hotel that doesn't happen.The hostess sat a table right behind us and it was so tight. One of the guests was on a wheelchair and she got no help, but not only that, we could hardly move when they all sat down. Most tables in the restaurant were empty.I chose this resort as it was my birthday and I wanted to celebrate in a nice place, but I was disappointed as I always expect more from Marri

name: Bluefin Seafood Bistro
review description: The food was excellent. To of us had lobsters which were perfectly cooked. one of us had ruby trout(Great) and the other had sea bass(well cooked).All in all a lovely dinner. We live in Green Valley, so the food had to be cooked forus to travel about 25 miles.

name: Bluewater Grill - Phoenix
review description: Only my second time here, but came back because we really liked the food. Fish easy on the spices, can actually taste the fish. Waitress was knowledgeable and helpful. Could have a better white wine selection since they have so many seafood options. I'll be back.

name: Bobby's Restaurant and Jazz Lounge
review description: Theres is a bar and dark lighting upstairs live jazz playing (soft dinner type of jazz) Music starts at 6pm during the week which is a nice change. Most jazz venues begin music much later. Very bright and airy downstairs - You have your choice. Awesome artwork on the walls. Best blackened salmon I have had in awhile. Nice wine list and full bar. We went during the week for our anniversary and the waiter came out at the end of our meal with a beautiful piece of cheesecake with a candle in it. Delicious AND It was on the house! A very nice touch from a very attentive waiter. We will definitely eat there again!

name: Bob's Steak and Chop House - Omni Tucson National Resort
review description: Very nice restaurant, though it was uncomfortably hot, with the exception of the entry hall which was very well air conditioned. The food was great, though the cook needs to be informed of the difference between medium rare and well done.

name: Bogey's Steak & Seafood
address: 7555 E. Eagle Crest Dr. Mesa, AZ  85207
review description: We ate there the last few days before a scheduled renovation. They had all of their menu items available on their standard menu but there was still enough choices. The food was excellent and the service was friendly and efficient.I can't wait for them to reopen.

name: Bombay Spice Phoenix
review description: I'm not qualified to comment on the authenticity of the food, but I will certainly vouch for the great taste. From the appetizers through the desserts, everything was excellent.

name: Bourbon Steak at The Fairmont Scottsdale Princess
review description: Although we enjoyed the experience, we found it stuffy and overpriced.

name: Brazilian Bull
review description: The food and the ambiance are great! We go back there whenever my fiance and I want to treat ourselves or their is a special occasion, this time we were celebrating his birthday. This visit we were surprised with a lunch deal, buy one traditional meal and get the second half off. We were thrilled about this until we got the bill and saw we were paying $7 for two Iced Teas, we drink iced tea every where we go and $3.50 for tea is going overboard.We can get better and cheaper tea at Starbucks, next time I will be sticking with water.

name: The Breadfruit
review description: We'd heard about this place, and looked forward to dinner. It's a gem! If you like food with tantalizing flavors, go here! The service was attentive and the atmosphere was energetic. There seems to be plenty for herbivores and carnivores to enjoy. We had vegetarian dishes - egg rolls, curry tofu, and sweet potato cake. I'm not a dessert person, but you gotta try the cake. The ribs and chicken dishes looked amazing! When we looked around, only emply plates were going back to the kitchen. Excellent rum choices! We look forward to going back.

name: Brittlebush Bar & Grill at The Westin Kierland Resort
review description: The Beer dinner series is a fabulous deal and Chef Graham and his staff always does a terrific job pairing delicious food with the beer from each brewery. We love the beer series.

name: Brix Restaurant and Wine Bar
address: 413 N. San Francisco St. Flagstaff, AZ  86001
review description: Food was positively fresh and outstanding. Highly recommended.

name: Buca di Beppo - Arrowhead
address: 16091 North Arrowhead Fountains Center Peoria, AZ  85382
review description: The service was not that great. The waiting staff was rude and disrespectful. One couple from my table got their food about 10 minutes ahead of every one else. The lasagna was dry and hard. It was just an overall unpleasant experience

name: Buca di Beppo - Chandler
review description: This was our first visit to Buca, and after the experience we had, it will not be our last! Our server was very knowledgeable, friendly and checked on us frequently. Our food was delicious and brought out fast. This was a huge plus for us because we have a 9 month old and the fast service ensured we were able to enjoy our dinner. Thank you and you will definitely see us again!!

name: Buca di Beppo - Mesa
address: 1730 South Val Vista Drive Mesa, AZ  85204
review description: We had a group of four adults and one child. They sat us at a table barely big enough for four people. It was awkward. We ended up snagging a chair from the table next to us. Our food was delicious as usual and our server was flamboyant. A little bit pricy so we don't dine here often.

name: Buca di Beppo - Scottsdale
review description: First time there. Staff was wonderful and friendly. The decor is marvelous. Was on first dated decor keep us very busy naming different people. What most impressed me, while walking out thru kitchen ypur workers were diligently scrubbing kitchen

name: Caffe Boa - Ahwatukee
review description: Always happy with a great restaurant that has Gluten Free Options.

name: Calistro Bistro DC Ranch Crossing
review description: Nothing special, certainly did not live up to its billing. I had the shortribs which at $29 or so were not worth the money. I would not go back. The place was so empty, I am not sure they will be in business long.

name: Calistro Bistro Hilton Village
address: 6107 N. Scottsdale Rd Suite 110 Scottsdale, AZ  85250
review description: We went to dinner early so the noise level was still low enough for us to talk. Music on the patio was just starting as we were leaving so we sat on the patio and had another glass of wine and listen for at least an hour. Van and Melanie were great and sang "our" type of music. They went around to the tables at their break and we found out about her dog and pot bellied pig rescue facility. Nice people. We will be back for the great food and music.

name: Canyon Cafe at Loews Ventana Canyon Resort
review description: enjoyable in all aspects, impeccable service

name: Capital Grille - Phoenix
review description: Food is outstandingThe summer wine Generous Pour program is a real wine steal

name: Capital Grille - Scottsdale
review description: outstanding!!! the Generous pour special is a must try for wine lovers...

name: Casa Mia
review description: We love Casa Mia and go as often as we can. Nantes was perfect, as always. The food is consistently delicious.

name: The Casablanca Lounge
address: 7134 E. Stetson Drive Ste 300 Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: The casa Blanca lounge was absolutely fantastic. I try to avoid old town Scottsdale as much as possible. Usually in old town the wait staffs act like the are doing you a favor by serving you, its packed all the time and the music is so loud your ears bleed. I was very suprised with Casa Blanca Lounge it was the complete opposite of my stereotype of old town. The wait staff was attentive but not annoying, the music was just perfect and the drinks were amazing. This has to be the best posse in AZ to get drinks. If service and the quality of what you pay for is important to you go to Casa Blanca you won't be disappointed. m

name: Cask 63
review description: Great food and service. Will be back!

name: Catalina Barbeque Co. & Sports Bar
address: 3645 W. Starr Pass Blvd. Tucson, AZ  85745
review description: Great atmosphere and excellent food, the best BBQ I've had in the city - It equals any BBQ I've eaten in my wife's home town of San Antonio, TX. It is also the most expensive BBQ I've ever eaten, $63 total for dinner and a drink each for two people, about double what I would expect from past experiences here and in San Antonio. I assume this is due to the restaurant's location in a swanky golf resort. I'll definitely go back for more, but, due to the price, it won't be a weekly visit

name: Cayton's at The Ritz-Carlton Golf Club, Dove Mountain
review description: Very limited menu but of excellent quality. Wait staff were appropriately friendly and attentive without being intrusive. Cush and Inez Cayton were gracious, hospitable people; I think they would be pleased.

name: Chad's Steakhouse & Saloon
review description: Good deal on their $20 Summer Special (if you like NY Strip Steak). A no nonsense old time local dinning spot. Good service from our young waiter "Bananas"?

name: Chart House Restaurant - Scottsdale
review description: The staff here are friendly, professional and attentive. The menu offers a nice variety of entrees and the presentation is beautiful. My husband had the ahi, which was marvelous, the potatoes however were nothing special. I had the chef's special which was a variety of seafood and it was all delicious. Since we avoided the salad bar and appetizers and desert, we left there satisfied without leftovers!

name: Che-Ah-Chi at Enchantment Resort
review description: View is outrageous!The chef prepared a custom vegetarian tasting menu for us.

name: Christopher's Restaurant/Crush Lounge
review description: Our server was knowledgable without being pretentious. The food was sophisticated using seasonal ingredients. We had a Parmesan encrusted goat cheese salad, lobster pot pie, tomato and mozarella pizza, and gruyere mashed potatoes. The last was a little bland. Desserts were phenominal and artistic. Wine list and scotch selection were adequate and reasonably priced. We were very pleased.

name: Cien Agaves Tacos & Tequila
review description: Food was delicious and plentiful. Really enjoyed the Chorizo Cheese Crisp. The waiter was friendly but not the best at refilling drinks. Signage suggests some good Happy Hour prices. Parking is iffy in Old Town Scottsdale. Would definitely return.

name: Citizen Public House
address: 7111 E. 5th Ave Ste. E Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: Food was wonderful. Had the Lamb Burger and fries. It got very noisy in restaurant so it can get hard to hear your date. Service was good but drinks were a little slow on the refill.

name: Compass Restaurant - Hyatt Regency Phoenix
review description: A very nice restaurant with good food, great service and unbeatable view.

name: Core Kitchen and Wine Bar at The Ritz-Carlton Dove Mountain
address: 15000 North Secret Springs Drive Marana, AZ  85658
review description: Everything about The Core was wonderful!

name: Cork Restaurant - Chandler
address: 4991 S. Alma School Rd. Ste 1 Chandler, AZ  85248
review description: We came for the tasting menu before the restaurant closed for the summer. Having been here for their happy hour fare we were excited to see what the chef could create. The food started out great. Perfectly cooked and seasoned. We tried all the different selections that were brought out to our table of 4 and there were plenty of ohhs and ahhs. But as the evening progressed and we moved to the entrees, 3 (hangar steak, couscous, and pork belly) of the 4 dishes were so incredibly salty, we couldn't finish them. The evening did end in a good note with beautiful desserts that were prepared with just the right amount of sweetness.

name: Cottage Place Restaurant
review description: Delicious food and excellent service by Fritz; we love going to the Cottage when we are in Flagstaff!

name: Coup des Tartes
review description: As always, this was a fantastic experience for my husband and me. The food is so good it is difficult to make a choice. I had the sea bass, which seriously, was probably the best I have ever had. My husband had the lamb shank, which is always great there too. This is such a sweet little place, we love it!

name: Crescent Moon
address: 10600 E. Crescent Moon Drive Scottsdale, AZ  85262
review description: We liked our server and the food was good but restaurant has a poor wine list that is very over priced for a very casual restaurant.

name: Crudo
review description: One word, fabulous!!! A little hard to find the first timebut well worth the effort.Tell your friends and enjoy!

name: The Cup Cafe
review description: A wonderful special meal pairing beer with food. Wonderfully done, with a delicious, creative menu. We also had a lovely time with the other diners we met at our group table. Jump, if you get a chance to enjoy one of these lovely evenings.

name: Dakota Cafe & Catering Co
address: 6541 E Tanque Verde Rd Suite 7 Tucson, AZ  85715
review description: This restaurant, located in Tucson's Trail Dust Town, is advertised as dog friendly and it certainly is! It's also quite people friendly, with a great choice of salads and sandwiches at lunch. The service was excellent, the patio more than tolerable even with an ambient temperature well over 100 degrees (thanks to the misters).

name: de la Cruz Bistro
review description: Overall great experience!!! Food, Drink, Service all top notch! I have been there a half dozen times and will keep going back, it is never a bad choice!

name: Del Frisco's Grille - Phoenix
review description: I ordered the salmon and it was good, but I asked for it to be well done and it was more like medium rare. One of my colleagues ordered his salmon medium and it was more like medium rare also. Other than that (and the salmon was still good), it was a good experience and I will go back again.

name: Deseo at the Westin Kierland Resort & Spa
review description: This was our 2nd trip to this restaurant. Food is outstanding, very creative, but not overly done. Ingredients are top quality and the menu is very interesting. Even the ceviche is not your normal citrusy ceviche. All the sauces are to die for. The cuisine is a mix of South American, Caribbean, Mexican, Japanese, French...Every plate tastes wonderful, with many flavors combined. Even the bread rolls (pan de yuca) are melting in your mouth. It is not a cheap restaurant by any mean but it is comparable to other resorts in Phoenix.I forgot to mention the cocktails! The Mango Mambo Mojito is top!! As a matter of fact I think next time I will go for cocktail and tapas (appetizers). Do not forget the chocolate cigar desert!

name: The Desert Oasis / The Artichoke Grill
review description: We were a group of 12.We attended the Italian buffet on May 4.The food was a poor attempt at Italian cooking. All 12 were sadly disappointed.We've gone for lunch & dinner in the past but this did not meet our expectations.

name: The Dhaba
review description: Outstanding service and great food. The waitress was very helpful and informative/

name: Different Pointe of View
address: Hilton Tapatio Cliffs 11111 N. 7th Street Phoenix, AZ  85020
review description: Here's the deal: We go for the view. It was our 26th wedding anniversary. No one asked if we were celebrating something, which would have been nice. Also, the food is average at best. The complimentary raspberry/lemonade/basil shooters were nice, so was pork bellies appetizer. The chicken - average to below average. Pork medallions undercooked - had to be sent back. Waiter should have asked how diner wanted pork cooked. The waiter smelled like smoke - not very appetizing.

name: Dillon’s Top of Central
review description: The food at Dillions was amazing. The server was great and always available. The two man band was very entertaining. It was our 10th anniversary so they gave my wife wine and a choice of any desert for free. All in all a great place to dine!

name: Dillon's Arrowhead
review description: Had the lunch special - Brisket Sandwich and sweet pototoe fries. Everone else had the pulled pork sandwich. The brisket was tender and had a good smoked flavor, the sweet potatoe fries were excellent. Would definitely go back.

name: Dillon's at the Zoo
address: 16335 W. Northern Ave Litchfield Park, AZ  85340
review description: This moderately priced restaurant is located at the Wildlife World Zoo. From the bar area, where you can dine inside or outside, you can enjoy the flamingo habitat and catch a monkey frolicking from tree to tree in the distance now and then. Inside, you can enjoy the aquariums. The menu is extensive, and the food is wonderful. An excellent value for the moderate prices and fantastic view of the zoo.

name: Dillon's Thunderbird
review description: basic barbecue, waitress came over to table once after taking order-never saw her

name: District American Kitchen and Wine Bar
review description: We ate a late dinner here after attending a Cirque du Soleil performance out in Glendale on a Saturday night in mid-July. The food was outstanding, starting with the best calamari appetizer we've ever had. One of us had beef, the other chicken. Both were perfectly cooked, with nuanced, flavorful sauces and to-die-for side dishes. We chose a modestlypriced cabernet that we had not had before and were pleasantly surprised.The service was attentive and friendly. A great find in downtown Phoenix.

name: Distrito AZ
review description: Really good food, especially the chicken and the brisket. Very tender meat and the presentation was nice. Also had a great white Sangria! I will definitely go back again!

name: Don & Charlie's
review description: Don & Charlies has been around for long time serving up the best steaks, ribs & chicken for years. I have no problems telling you if you want a great meal and some the the finest sport memorabilia to look in the valley make your reservations today.

name: DOWNTOWN Kitchen + Cocktails
review description: We enjoy going to Downtown Kitchen + Cocktails for dinner and a late night treat when appetizers, drinks, and desserts are half priced. The food is good and the atmosphere is energetic. Also, the service is attentive without being excessive. This time we went to try their Valencia Menu featuring dishes inspired by Spanish regional cuisine. While we were not impressed with the kitchen's interpretation of melon with serrano ham, cod croquettes, paella, fideuà, or horchata with fartons, the fennel ice cream with almond cake was delicious and tasted like Spain (the melon with ham soup, cod croquettes and fideuà were tasty but did not resemble the Spanish originals). We appreciate the risks the kitchen took and look forward to our next visit!

name: Durant's
review description: All was Purrrfect as always.Keep up the great job all staff and management of Durant's.

name: Eddie V's - Scottsdale Quarter
address: 15323 N Scottsdale Rd suite E1-160 Scottsdale, AZ  85254
review description: What a wonderful experience. Great food, great service, great drinks. Courses were well timed, staff was well informed, professional and very happy to serve. Our birthday celebration could not have been better. Thanks!

name: Eddie's House
address: 7042 E. Indian School Rd. Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: Always have good food & a pleasant experience at Eddie Matneys!

name: El Chorro
address: 5550 E Lincoln Dr. Paradise Valley, AZ  85253
review description: great food and service. noisy, however. and tables right next to each other - so it's not an intimate setting, nor one even for normal conversation.

name: elements at Sanctuary Camelback Mountain
review description: Went for a business meeting and was seated in the corner (which was nice). Views were great as was the food. We both had the short-rib pasta special. I think the service was a bit overbearing as we were interrupted every few minutes with questions. I would bring business contacts here again for lunch.

name: Feast - Tucson
review description: Great food, wonderful place and love it that Chef Levy always greets his guests.Food is interesting and yummy. Not just a normal uninteresting menu - ever and always seasonal bests

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Chandler
review description: The food was well prepared with above average presentation. The wine recommendation was well paired with our meal. The meal was pallet pleasing and defined with the right amount of seasoning. A good side combination were the potatoes and the asparagus. Try the calimari for an appetizer, it really pops with the sweet chile. The recommended meal closer of the Lava cake was wonderful, with the rich and sweet dessert and freash cream, great. This meal coupled with the atomosphere, made this an outstanding dining experience.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - DC Ranch
address: 20753 N. Pima Road Bldg. R Scottsdale, AZ  85255
review description: I was very impressed with Flemings associates hospitality.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Peoria
review description: The carrot cake and out waiter were outstanding!

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Tucson
address: 6360 N. Campbell Avenue Suite 180 Tucson, AZ  85718
review description: Nice people doing good work. A steady kitchen and a wait staff that always seems to enjoy what they do and make guests feel comfortable. Many repeat visits for this local favorite which is only coincidentally part of a chain.

name: The Flying V at Loews Ventana Canyon Resort
review description: The duck tacos were sublime! They are exactly the kind of imaginitive appetizer one could expect at a upscale establishement in Mexico City. The chef and kitchen get my applause since they executed them without a hitch, especially considering the fact that duck is often botched by the inexperienced.

name: Frank & Alberts
address: Arizona Biltmore 2400 E. Missouri Phoenix, AZ  85016
review description: There with a special friend, it was her first time and she loved the food and the ambiance.

name: Gianfranco Ristorante
review description: Great place out in the "country" away from the hustle and bustle of the neighborhoods.

name: GOLD
review description: One wants thesefolks to succeed. With the proprty being taken over by Wyndham, maybe somebody will pay attention to the potential of this lovely dining space and create a destination dining spot rather than a hotel restaurant. And ask somebody who knows something about wine to create a list worthy of the menu.

name: Grand Canyon Dinner Theatre & Steakhouse
review description: It was great to have this level of entertainment at a place we did not expect to find!

name: Graze Desert Grille
review description: We had a small group (4) for a business dinner. One of the attendees had been to the restaurant for group events before. Unfortunately the server was less than attentive, despite there being a very light attendance at the restaurant. After the cocktails were served, service fell off dramatically. Appetizers were served and it was evident that she put the dinner orders in right away and wanted to hurry up with the entrees. One of the attendees used to own a restaurant and was very disappointed. We selected the restaurant based on other reviews, but will not return.

name: Greekfest
review description: Wonderful, as always. That's why we keep coming back.

name: The Greene House - Kierland Commons
address: 15024 N. Scottsdale Road, Suite 100 Scottsdale, AZ  85254
review description: The only negative for some here would be the noise level. Had dinner with a friend with a very restricted diet and the restaurant was very accommodating.

name: The Grill at Hacienda del Sol
address: 5501 N. Hacienda del Sol Rd. Tucson, AZ  85718
review description: Always a favorite and always up to what we expect.

name: The Grill at The Boulders
address: 34631 N Tom Darlington Dr Scottsdale, AZ  85377
review description: The ambiance and service were very good. My dinner was delicious; my husband felt his dinner was good/fair.

name: The Grill at The Fairmont
review description: Consistently fine dining - well prepared food, great service and fine wines. Extremely friendly personnel.

name: The Grille at Shadowrock Sedona Hilton
review description: Great food. We really enjoyed the atmosphere on the patio. Service was outstanding.

name: Guadalajara Fiesta Grill
review description: The food has always been excellent, but this is a very noisy restaurnat! Especially when the mariachis begin playing, which while fun in sparing amounts can be overbearing when the linger too long in one section, which they frequently do. Surprisingly, the margaritas on our last vist were sub-par, the house VERY sour and the cadillac over-marnier'ed AND the server got them wrong, delivering the Cadillac to my wife and the house to me. Also the cadillac was served in a standard glass tumbler, not the bowl it typically deserves. In fairness we typically get great margaritas here but these were extremely dissapointing, and the service was so poor we didn't get the chance to notify the server.

name: Guadalajara Original Grill
review description: This Tucson tradition has earned the "old favorite" label and wears it well. Nothing to get too excited about but a mammoth menu with litereally something for everyone and a variety of margarita concoctions make it a satisfying stop--always.

name: Harvest Restaurant
address: 10355 N. LaCanada Dr Oro Valley, AZ  85737
review description: Creative menu with interesting fresh food options and appealing and scrumptious desserts in particular. Given that the restaurant was nearly empty, the rushed and disruptive service was somewhat disappointing. Also waiter was not particularly knowledgeable and, at times, difficult to find.

name: The Heartline Cafe
review description: Our Tapas meal was lousy!!! The meatballs were swimming in grease. The chicken (on skewers) were dry as the desert!!!

name: The House at Secret Garden
review description: This was a birthday dinner for my best friend. I had dined at the House before, she had not; she loved everything about it. She had the catch of the day (halibut) and declared it the best; I had the lemon chicken and smashed potatos, really would have preferred mashed. The appetizer was outstanding and we special ordered their sweet potato chips which are unlike any other - I asked for another order to take home. Dessert - sweet potato cake with spiced whipped cream and vanilla ice cream was just right and the coffee was excellent.

name: House of Tricks
review description: What an outstanding restaurant - a real gem! As a visitor to the area we would probably make this our first visit on each return. Wonderful menu with just the right amount of creativity - none of the dishes got away from the chef in terms of complexity and execution. Very highest quality ingredients and very fair pricing. For a small, almost hidden restaurant the choices were wide ranging. The chef's experiences in France come through in each of the dishes.

name: HUB Restaurant & Ice Creamery
review description: We went on a Saturday night, which happened to also be a "Second Saturday" night downtown, so they were understandably busy. The place was packed and we got a small table near the front window, which was a lot of fun because it allowed us to watch all the weird people walk by.We started with the Asian chicken wings, which were pretty yummy, not loaded with sauce and not too crispy... really good.I got bacon cheeseburger and fries: The fries were great, the burger was way over salted. it was OK. My girlfriend ordered the mac n cheese which was very cheesy and pretty good!The drinks were both fantastic, however $8 for the tiny size of drink we got was pretty sad price :(The ice-cream was amazing (oatmeal cookie dough)

name: Hundred Rox
review description: It would have been nice to know that the restaurant was undergoing renovations. But what was really awesome was that we asked to be picked up at our nearby hotel b/c of monsoon storm and they were totally accommodating. Very grateful.

name: Il Terrazzo - The Phoenician
review description: The food and experience here are always excellent. However, I have to say both of our dishes were sub-par this go around to previous meals we've had there, which are usually excellent. I think it was just an off night. At least I hope so as we frequent this place.

name: J&G Steakhouse Scottsdale at The Phoenician
review description: The food was delicious and one of the best meals I've had in a long time. It's in a resort so there were lots of people in casual wear, with kids and unfortunately one super loud family (6 adults yelling). The table next to us asked us if we were at a ball game. Beautiful view and a great place to have dinner and then move into the patio and enjoy the view

name: J. Alexander's
review description: Really good food and service was good. My only improvement was that it was really dark in the booth and difficult to see the food - a personal preference

name: Jasper Neighborhood Restaurant & Bar
address: 6370 N Campbell Ave Ste 160 Tucson, AZ  85718
review description: Excellent local jazz band was playing on the patio the Saturday evening we had dinner here. Food was mediocre--our waiter was fantastic, though. Stay away from the flatbread and try the fish tacos. Beautiful spot for outdoor dining with a spectacular view of the Catalinas.

name: Josephine's Modern American Bistro
review description: The menu seemed a bit old-fashioned. As though the menu was designed in the 1980s and not updated since. I ate a lamb dish that just had too much stuff going on: bacon and too much sweet sauce. A simpler grilled lamb chop with a sauce on the side would have been better.

name: Kabuki Japanese Restaurant - Glendale
address: 6770 N Sunrise Blvd Suite G-211 Glendale, AZ  85305
review description: When you walk in and the first person you see is the hostess and she can't even greet you with a smile it turns you off completely! I even tried to joke with her and nothing! It was 115 outside and she asked us if we wanted to sit outside... Really? Then she seats us and plops down the menus and walks away! Our waiter took his time to get to our table he was ok nothing special. Once we received our sushi it was sub par nothing great I think for the price it should of been a whole lot better, presentation was sloppy. The vegi ramen was great but my teriyaki salmon was horrible. I would try it again to see if things are better and only order the soup. They really need a nice hostess that knows customer service and knows how to smile.

name: Kabuki Japanese Restaurant - Tempe
address: 2000 E Rio Salado Parkway Tempe, AZ  85281
review description: We had a group of 12. But could not reserve one table together. So had to put it in in 2 reservations. But when we arrived they were nice enough th accommodate and put all 8 of us together( 4 cancelled).They took a little time to get the tables ready. It was my daughters 20th Bday. Very nice setting and decor for the younger generations. Especially girls who like sushi and light healthy dishes. Very well chef'ed food. Appetizers were excellent and savory.Negative: took them 10 mins to get us forks and knives! Gotta know how to work chopsticks!

name: Kai - Sheraton Wild Horse Pass Resort
address: 5594 W. Wildhorse Pass Blvd Chandler, AZ  85226
review description: I would highly recommend Kai for any special occasion or a nice night out. The food, presentation and service were all outstanding. The staff is very knowledgeable about all aspects of the menu, including the beverage/wine list. The Essence of Summer is a fantastic menu of a creamy gazpacho soup with buffalo bacon, buffalo steak cooked to perfection -- tender and juicy --, and a to die for chocolate mousse, just remove the random pistachio covered green olive (flavors did not mesh well).

name: Kincaid's - Phoenix
review description: Our server Drew made the experience a great one!

name: Kingfisher Bar & Grill
review description: I love this place! Always have, and it never disappoints. Food is consistently good whether at lunch or dinner, and the service is, like the food, consistently excellent.

name: Kona Grill - Chandler
address: 3111 W. Chandler Boulevard Chandler Fashion Center Chandler, AZ  85226
review description: I have eaten here seval time and it is always hit and miss.. Tonight was a big miss, and I don't plan on going back anytime soon. We order sushi and it came to the table a hour after we arrived. A few minutes later the entree's were sent to the table. Water glasses were empty most of the meal. The sushi was good. The entree's ranged from great (steak flatbread) to awful (meatloaf).

name: Kona Grill - Gilbert
address: 2224 E Williams Field Road Gilbert, AZ  85295
review description: We have been here many times. One of our favorite places. We went here for my wife's birthday as we love this place. Food was good but the service was horrible. Our waiter, Able, should have been named unAble was horrible. My wife ordered a drink and didn't come out as ordered, took it back and she didn't like it so ordered something else. We had a table of six. Our food took 45 minutes to come out. It wasn't busy either. Our food came out and we had ordered the Hawaiian rib eye which we have gotten before and loved, but this time it was overbooked and dry. When it came to get the check, everyone's check was messed up. We we charged for the two drinks my wife didn't want, had other people food on our bill. This happened 4 more times.

name: Kona Grill - Phoenix
address: 5310 E. High St #101 City North Phoenix, AZ  85054
review description: Server was amazing. Food great. Lots of choices. Great happy hours. We always have a nice meal.

name: Kona Grill - Scottsdale
address: 7014 E. Camelback Road Scottsdale Fashion Square Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: Good place for lunch meetings ...try their sweet chile glazed salmon salad...

name: Ko'sin Sheraton Wild Horse Pass Resort
address: 5594 W. Wildhorse Pass Blvd Chandler, AZ  85226
review description: The staff and food are both excellent!

name: La Hacienda at The Fairmont
review description: love the ambience of this place, best outdoor comfortable but refined dining. Returned for my favorite lobster tacos and to share place w friends, but overall feel less accomodating this time. bartender was rude when asked for a margarita without sweet and sour, and snuck in sweet and sour anyway. Waiter helpful with menu suggestions, but overall service slow- drink refills, not offering to refill chips, not offering sides etc. first time dining outside which was beautiful, but not the level of service we are used to receiving inside at la hacienda, and it seemed adequately staffed. medium guacamole prepared table side was bland, lobster tacos as an entree needed a side dish. no longer my go to place, my friends wished we went to Rokery

name: La Torretta Ristorante
review description: We tried La Torretta on a Monday night when practically no one was there. I LOVE Italian food like you find on Columbia St in San Francisco. So far, I haven't found a spot in Phoenix that really hits the mark, including La Torretta.

name: L'Amore
review description: There always is a welcome greeting upon arrival. The restaurant was not busy on the Tuesday evening when we dined at 7:30 PM; by the time we were finished our meal shortly after 9:00 PM we were the last persons in the restaurant. The food is presented in a tasty manner; the sliced Italian bread is freshly baked with olive oil on the table as well as butter. I wish there was another choice of salad with the entree. No need for dessert after a delicious main course.

name: Lariat Restaurant
review description: We had an excellent experience at The Lariat.

name: L'Auberge Restaurant on Oak Creek
review description: We have many wonderful memories from our early years of dating which bring us back to L'Auberge. Now, 20 years later, it still holds a special place in our hearts. Also such a peaceful and beautiful place, while serving delicious food, what more could we want?

name: Le Rendez-vous Bistro & Restaurant Francais
review description: We've been twice now. The first time for a romantic sit down date night and the second for happy hour for my birthday. Both were completely different but wonderful! Le Rendez-vous is right down the street but we had no idea it had such amazing food and a great happy hour.

name: Litchfield's
address: 300 E. Wigwam Boulevard Litchfield Park, AZ  85340
review description: A hidden gem alerted to us by another restaurant manager when we asked where he would go for a great steak. He was right. My wifes filet was outstanding and my pan seared halibut was great. Although we ate a little early ; around 6:30, the staff was on their game. From the hosts to the chefs and wait staff everyone was very friendly and courteous.at almost 100 years old this resoprt has it all not only a great restaurant.

name: Local Bistro + Bar
review description: This was one of the outstanding restaurants on our recent visit to Scottsdale. When we walked in to Local it was packed, and seeing how it was more a neighbourhood spot we figured it would be good. We were treated to an amazing meal, wine and service. Would certainly return on our next visit.

name: Lon's at The Hermosa
address: 5532 North Palo Cristi Road Paradise Valley, AZ  85253
review description: Very nice...but pricey dining experience.

name: Mabel's
review description: A nice place. Great happy hour. The food was excellent. Had to wait a bit for service when we arrived.

name: Maggiano's - Scottsdale
review description: Our waiter was named Kenneth. He did an outstanding job and made our birthday celebration extra special! Thank you Kenneth!

name: Mama Louisa's Italian Restaurant
review description: Great value, tasty food. No it's not gourmet, just nice Italian food. Friendly staff and fast service. Veal dish and Chicken piccata dish served with pasta on the side, soup and salad bar included and two beverages for $30.00.. great deal!

name: Marcellino Ristorante
review description: Hands down, this is the best meal we've had in a long time! We chose to sit at the counter without realizing that it would put us in direct contact with Chef Marcellino. He took care of us personally, sharing the fresh made pastas, chatting with us, selecting a special dessert for us, helping with our wine selection. Besides the chef being charming, the fresh pasta was outstanding. Mine was small sheets of pasta with shaved truffles on top - seriously?! My husband had saffron pasta with fresh Manila clams and broccoli rabe. Fantastic! We started with imported bufalo mozzarella and prosciutto with basil grow in the chefs garden - who does that? We ended our meal with a lovely lemoncella with lemons grown in the chefs garden. OUTSTANDING!!!

name: Mastro's City Hall Steakhouse
review description: Best steakhouse in the valley! Love this place!!ce

name: Mastro's Ocean Club - Scottsdale
review description: Dinner was delicious, as it always is. My husband and son particularly love your Ahi Tuna on the bone. The sides are wonderful.

name: Mastro's Steakhouse - Scottsdale
address: 8852 E. Pinnacle Peak Road Scottsdale, AZ  85255
review description: The food was excellent. I expected the food prices to be high, but the drink prices were ridiculous...$69.00 for 3-drinks was outrageous. The waiter "recommended" a new vodka, that turned out to be $13.50 per shot, so a double was $27.00.

name: Maynards Market + Kitchen
address: 400 N. Toole Ave Suite 100 Tucson, AZ  85701
review description: Overall an enjoyable experience. We requested a nice booth away from the kitchen, and were given just that. We were greeted promptly, so quickly in fact that we didn't know what we wanted to drink. We took a few moments, than placed our drink order. we ordered the farmers artisan cheese plate and the summer salad. we had ordered the salad split but it came as a whole, not a big deal, just a small bump in service. We then ordered another round of drinks, which came at a medium pace. The food was amazing, and we were then comped a Watermelon Cucumber Sorbet that was the best we'd ever had. This was a birthday lunch and they made it feel very special. The only feedback I'd give is service was slightly slow, but overall, 4 out of 5 stars. thanx

name: McMahon's Prime Steakhouse
review description: An excellent choice for a business chat or catching up with a friend over lunch. Food was well prepared and tasty and service was just right--there when you needed them but not intrusive.

name: The Melting Pot - Tucson
address: 7395 N. La Cholla Blvd. Tucson, AZ  85741
review description: It was a quiet night which made a big difference in noise level as the restaurant intends to be noisy on busy nights. We were offered a couples booth which is quiet and private; very nice. Samantha, our waiter, was friendly and cheerful as always, good was good and tasteful... I love coming here. Too bad it is sooo pricy!

name: Meritage Steakhouse @ JW Marriott Desert Ridge
review description: This very good steakhouse paid close attention to meat quality and sauces and butters. The peppercorn demi-glace was exceptional as was the blue cheese butter. The prawn cocktail was served with a cocktail sauce that included orange zest and that was a very surprising and delicious change. The service was not overly attentive, but a bit stiffly formal.

name: Metropolitan Grill
review description: Our "go to" restaurant. Always good food at a fair price in a nice setting.

name: Mia Francesca-Scottsdale
review description: This is a terrific little neighborhood hang out. Great italian at nice prices and a good wine list. Highly recommended.

name: Miguel's
review description: We made reservations for Sunday night and OPen Table did not tell us that the restaurant was not open on Sunday evening. Not good.

name: The Mint Restaurant Ultra Lounge
review description: Food was decent - $10 bottomless mimosa and bloody mary's are the draw. It's still a night club with cocktails servers trying to be waitresses so the service was spotty but it's a vibrant scene with good music...

name: The Mission
review description: Our thanks to the staff at The Mission especially Kim. They were very knowledgable, friendly and there when you needed them and out of sight when we didn't need them. Very enjoyable evening. We will be back!

name: Modern Steak
address: 7014 E. Camelback Road Suite 1433 Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: Great food and beautiful atmosphere!

name: Monti's La Casa Vieja
review description: I work downtown so have frequented Monti's. I was surprised at the prices this time around. It was quite expensive for lunch. Also, I was disappointed that my favorite sandwich was taken off of the lunch menu. Will probably not come back for lunch.

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - Scottsdale
review description: We come back every year celebrate my mom having another cancer free year. The staff is so warm and friendly and welcomes us which is why we will always come back to Mortons -Scottsdale.

name: Nellie Cashman's Monday Club Cafe at The Westin Kierland Resort & Spa
review description: We really enjoyed the sunday brunch with bubbles. The food was excellent and fresh which you don't always find with buffets. There were different options to try and everything we did have was delicious. It seemed pretty quiet which was nice. Service was very good. We would go back for brunch again for sure.

name: Nimbus American Bistro & Brewery
address: 6464 E. Tanque Verde Rd. Tucson, AZ  85715
review description: We made our reservation about 45 minutes prior to arrival and when we got there, were told that they just received it and it would be another 10- 15 minutes. About 2 minutes later we were seated. Our waiter stopped by within a couple minutes and took our drink orders. Then the manager stopped by and asked how we were and if everything was alright. He apologized and let us know that over 100 folks had shown up for a high school reunion without making reservations and that our food might take a little longer due to this fact. I didn't find the wait to be unacceptable and really appreciated the manager taking the time to let us know. The waiter was absolutely attentive and it was a great experience. Food was quite good too.

name: Nimbus American Bistro & Brewery - Scottsdale
address: 7001 N. Scottsdale Rd Ste 147 Scottsdale, AZ  85253
review description: Great area and setting in the shopping area. Nice staff and very friendly. A quality bar/brewery.

name: Nobuo at Teeter House
review description: I took my Japanese clients to dinner and they were impressed with the authenticity of the food. The Sake was very good. My Japanese clients said, "This is much better than any Japanese food we can get in New York."

name: noca
review description: Great experience, again. Our favorite restaurant.

name: Noh - Hyatt Regency Scottsdale
address: 7500 E. Doubletree Ranch Rd. Scottsdale, AZ  85258
review description: The sushi was innovative and very fresh!

name: NoRTH - Scottsdale
address: 15024 N. Scottsdale Rd, Suite 160 Scottsdale, AZ  85254
review description: I have been to North twice before and the food has become bland and mediocre. The highlight of the meal was the bruschetta, which is not a good sign when the entree cannot compete with the appetizer.

name: NoRTH - Tucson
review description: Excellent food and service; gorgeous view. Only slightly negative note: Not all the tables were filled, and it was still difficult to hear across the table.

name: NORTH Arcadia
review description: North Arcadia is fantastic - a really great concept, you feel you are in an Italian farmhouse and get to watch the chef staff creating the fresh pastas and meals. I highly recommend it and visit the sister restaurant at Kierland which has undergone some major updates to the restaurant as well as menu. Another hit out of the park for Fox Concepts.

name: Ocean Prime - Phoenix
address: 5455 East High Street Suite 115 Phoenix, AZ  85054
review description: We were pleasantly surprised to find Ocean Prime within a short jaunt from our condo at Marriott's Canyon Villas. The tuna and the crab cake appetizers were awesome. French onion soup was as good as homemade. The entres ( scallops, twin lobster tails, and filet were excellent. Really enjoyed this place. An interesting wine list, along with the enormous cocktail pours rounded out the wonderful meal. Service staff was excellent and even had a quick chat with the GM who had relocated from Columbus. Decor alone was worth the trip.

name: Old Pueblo Grille
review description: In the main course for my wife the chicken was tough. When the waiter did eventually come by and ask how the meal was, he did take it back and provide another. The chicken was better, but still not really tender. My dish had beef and shrimp. These and vegetables were tasty, but the beef was chewy.Service was poor. The waiter did not bring rolls until we requested them and took a long time to come by to check on our food.The table was for 2, but was very tight.

name: Olive & Ivy Restaurant & Marketplace
address: 7135 E. Camelback Road, Suite 195 Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: This was my first visit to the restaurant and I thought it was nice and the food was good. However, my husband ordered the Monk fish and the portion was very small for the price. I think I would keep this on my list for lunch and not dinner for that reason.

name: Omaha Steakhouse -Phoenix
review description: My husband and I were there to celebrate his 60th birthday and our 40th wedding anniversary. The service staff was great, food was excellent, and the manager came over to congratulate us. The perfect start for a special evening.

name: Palm Court at The Scottsdale Resort
review description: Some of the best table side service at any restaurant we have ever been too. Banana's Foster prepared table side was off the chart. Great summer 5 course wine pairing at great price.

name: Palo Verde at The Boulders Resort
address: 34631 N. Tom Darlington Drive Carefree, AZ  85377
review description: A very beautiful setting, serving excellent food, with terrific wait staff and manager.

name: Pasta Brioni
review description: Overall a good italian place and pretty casual. There were a few things missing like good bread! That to me is a must in an italian restaurant. Had the linguini in clams; pretty good. Ahi carpaccio was not that great and wouldn't order again. I'd go back but not at the top of my list.

name: Pastiche Modern Eatery
review description: This was our second time to eat at Pastiche in about 5 years (we rarely go out to restaurants). Both my husband and I were very satisfied, in all regards. I've been watching my calories and the serving was ample, yet I was not tempted huge portions on the main dinner plate. I would have loved to try the desserts, but kept to my resolve.

name: Persian Room
review description: I go to the Persian room frequently and it is one of our favorite restaurants. But why do I not get points when I book through OpenTable?

name: Petite Maison
review description: We had the brunch, it also coma with never ending momosas. Delisous truffle fries, and the creeps were outstanding.

name: Phoenix City Grille
review description: Went there for 1st anniversary with my girlfriend. She got the tilapia which was a bit dry but I had the pot roast and it was very good. I also really liked the horseradish potatoes that came with (my gf didn't as much since she dislikes horseradish). After noticing a gift my girlfriend brought, our waiter asked if it was a birthday. We said anniversary and he gave us a dessert on the house. We picked bread pudding, which was also very tasty.

name: Pinon Grill
review description: Everything was fine. Not much more than that.

name: Posh - Scottsdale
address: 7167 East Rancho Vista Drive Unit 111 Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: This was probably our 6th or 7th visit to the restaurant and we've never been disappointed. Love the improvisational concept (no menu)! This time around, we sampled some interesting things like veal sweetbreads, pork belly and pig ear char su bao. We also had the most tender calamari I've ever had. The wine pairings were amazing too. Always a perfect pairing. Overall, Posh never disappoints. We will return!

name: Prado - Montelucia Resort
review description: Spectacular views, comfortable chairs, great service, wonderful wine, and delectable food made our dining experience delightful. The white bean hummus and the caramelized onion and cherry vassi (assorted flatbreads and crackers with a mini Mason jar of your favorite topping) were so good, we almost didn't save room for our next course, the white kale salad with roasted stone fruit. Which would have been tragic, because that was the best salad I have ever tasted. As vegans, we were already in heaven, and it only got better when the gnocchi with arugula pesto arrived. Our view of Camelback Mountain and the exquisitely comfortable chairs contributed to our decision to dine at Prado again and again.

name: Primo at the JW Marriott Starr Pass Resort & Spa
address: 3800 W. Starr Pass Boulevard Tucson, AZ  85745
review description: Go and enjoy the entire Starr Pass Marriott experince. Start with a drink on the patio. Participate in their nightly "salute to the sunset at 5:30". Then on to dinner.

name: Province
review description: Latin Passport night at Province was wonderful! The food was delicious and the service impeccable. We will be back again and have started spreading the word on FaceBook, too. So great to have delicious food, good ambiance, at an affordable price and the location (right in the heart of downtown) is fabulous.

name: Pure Sushi
review description: A nice, clean, and friendly place. The food was very good. it is a great place for everyone to enjoy really great food and excellent service.

name: PY Steakhouse
review description: 4 Casino employee were not able to specifically direct us to the restaurant -- we went in a complete circle, around inside the casino before getting to the restaurant AND it was only about 10 feet away to head back out where we started.

name: Quiessence Restaurant & Wine Bar
review description: This is a wonderful restaurant. We eat all over the world and have experienced a lot of great restaurants and this one is a memorable experience. The only tough part was trusting the GPS to find it. For an "out of towner" it was a little surreal. Happy we did not give up!! Food great, ambience nice and excelent service. Quite casual for such a fine dining place.

name: Rancho Pinot
review description: This was a great experience. I had never heard of Rancho Pinot, the food was the best I've had in a long time. Would love to go back.

name: Rare Earth Wine Bar
address: 28190 N. Alma School Pkwy #209 Scottsdale, AZ  85262
review description: Pizza, salad and wine! Perfect. The entertainment was great that night too!

name: Rawhide Steakhouse at Wild Horse Pass
address: 5700 W North Loop Road Chandler, AZ  85226
review description: Although this is practically sitting in our backyard, we had not visited the new Chandler location since it opened. We had 7 guests visiting from out of state and we all had a ball!! I would highly recommend this for a night out with children.

name: Red Allen's
address: 300 East Wigwam Blvd Litchfield Park, AZ  85340
review description: The service was outstanding. The dining room needs to be seriously spruced up; new paint, etc.

name: Reds at Sedona Rouge Hotel & Spa
review description: I had a delicious meal with wonderful live music. It was so romantic. This is my second visit and I plan to return whenever I am in town. We ordered from their special menu. What a great deal for a 3 course meal.

name: Relish Burger Bistro - The Phoenician
review description: I would recommend but only for the tableside S'mores. I thought the burger and tots were just "ok". The fried pickles had a tasteless batter that didn't stick well to the spear. The decor seemed very dated.

name: Richardson's Cuisine of New Mexico
review description: Loved it, server was a little slow to greet us and serve us water and take drink orders. Food was great.

name: Ristorante Tuscany @ JW Marriott Desert Ridge
review description: Delicious food, good wine list, great service, and close to home! What more could we ask for in a restaurant? Thanks you!

name: Rita's Kitchen at Camelback Inn, A J.W. Marriott Resort
review description: This is a true gem located in the Marriott Camelback Inn. Great food, the enchilada's and carnita's are awesome. Patron hand shaken marg's and ice cold beers. I live in the valley and this is one of my favorites! Highly recommended!

name: Roaring Fork
review description: Food and service were great! I'll be back.

name: ROKA AKOR - Scottsdale
review description: Just a great place in Scottsdale, overlooked to often because a little far from old town but not north Scottsdale. Just great building and food

name: Rokerij
review description: We are big fans of Richardsons (their "parent" restaurant ) and Rokerij lived up to expectations! Only bummer was that it took 20 min to get our reserved table and the hostess was not stellar... Wish we had been told it would take so long. That aside, the wine and food were great. You can order some Richarsons favorites and of course Rokerij's own unique items.

name: Roy's Chandler
review description: This was our first time experience to Roy's and selected it via the Opentable website. What a great selection. Our servers were excellent, friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. They're "keepers". You'll be pampered!!!

name: Roy's Desert Ridge
review description: A definite Hawaiian feel. Very relaxing.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Phoenix
address: 2201 E. Camelback Road, Suite 106-A Phoenix, AZ  85016
review description: This was our first visit to this location. We have been to many other locations around the country. On this visit we were disappointed. My husbands filet was as he described it "gamey". My filet, which was a bone in filet was wonderful, I would highly recommend it. The server was wonderful, very attentive. The manager stopped by our table toward the end of our evening to talk with us about the dinner. We expected that a manager visit would have happened immediately after the main entree was returned. Our wine was lovely, the rest of our dinner was as expected for a Ruth's Chris. We would have rated the visit higher if not for the one instance of the meat and the length of time it took for the manager's visit.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Scottsdale
address: 7001 N. Scottsdale Road, Suite 290 Scottsdale, AZ  85253
review description: excellent diner n waiter was very good

name: Saddle Ranch Chop House - Glendale
review description: This place seems very apropriate for the 20 or 30somethings who want to hang out, drink, and look at scantaly-clad girls. It was not a good place for any sort of date due to the noise. Decor was very interesting. With the way the servers were dressed, I would only hope that Saddle Ranch is not a 'kid-friendly' place.

name: Saddle Ranch Chop House - Scottsdale
review description: Food is high end steaks and shrimp. Service is outstanding! I'd recommend this to everyone that wants agood long evening out. Get the mac n' cheese. Either the Truffle or Jalepeno. Chili and Tortilla soups-great. Lana and Erika(mgr) Rock!!

name: SanTan Brewing Co.
address: 8 S. San Marcos Place Chandler, AZ  85225
review description: Excellent pub food and great beer in a fun atmosphere.

name: Sapporo
review description: Very nice place! Everything was excellent. Wish they would have told me about the Happy Hour menu vs spending a small fortune

name: SASSI
address: 10455 E Pinnacle Peak Pkwy (Not Pinnacle Peak Road) Scottsdale, AZ  85255
review description: Beautiful location and enjoyable atmosphere. Service was wonderful.

name: Seasons 52 - Phoenix
review description: Our server Alex was fantastic. This was our second time there and the service, food, and ambiance were same.....excellent. I would recommend Season's 52 to everyone.

name: ShinBay
review description: Omikasa experience is truly memorable, equal to or exceeding any I've had in New York or San Francisco.Quality, variety, and presentation are exceptional. Chef's Counter is highly recommended. Memorable and highly recommended.

name: Shugrue's
address: 1425 N. McCulloch Blvd. Lake Havasu City, AZ  86403
review description: The food and ambiance were wonderful. However, the star of the show was the service. Kelsey, our server, was spectacular. She was friendly, knowledgeable and efficient; A wonderful combination!

name: Shugrues Hillside Grill
review description: Food was good although my husband had to send his tuna steak back and because of the incident they were very accommodating and offered us dessert.I didn't think the decor was so fabulous. I almost felt like I was in an upscale dinner. And we didn't have a few so I cannot comment on this.I would probably try some other resaurants that we didn't have time for on our next visit.

name: Shula's Steak House - Wild Horse Pass Hotel & Casino
address: 5040 Wild Horse Pass Boulevard Chandler, AZ  85226
review description: The best service and steaks ever

name: Sierra Bonita Grill
review description: Great food, good vibe, good service. Love this place. A bit pricey though....

name: Signature Grill at the JW Marriott Starr Pass Resort & Spa
address: 3800 W. Starr Pass Boulevard Tucson, AZ  85745
review description: This is a very nice place!! Our server was not attentive at all!! I had to call for the floor manager a couple of times when we needed service. The NY Strip steaks were over cooked. I'm sure they would have tasted awesome if they were cooked the way we asked for them. When you order a glass of wine and ask for a another the server will bring out a premeasured craft of wine and pour it into your glass, which fills the glass to 1/3 full. What happened to the days when you ate at a restaurant and asked for another glass of wine, then they would bring out the bottle and top you off.

name: Soi Four
review description: Wonderful, uncomplicated Thai food bursting with flavor. Service is always excellent, with great recommendations.

name: SOL Cocina
address: 15323 N. Scottsdale Rd Suite 195 Scottsdale, AZ  85254
review description: Great menu, professional service

name: Spotted Donkey Cantina, el Pedregal
address: 34505 N. Scottsdale Road, Suite G2 Scottsdale, AZ  85262
review description: The pork tenderloin with mac & cheese is the best ever and beautifully presented.

name: St. Francis
review description: The Sunday jazz brunch is a delight. The egg sandwich, which sounds so pedestrian, was raised to an art form with frisee and ever-so-ripe heirloom tomatoes. We sat upstairs and the lovely scat of the trio made for a great background. We didn't have them, but the sticky buns looked like a gift from the gods. One appears to feed 4 quite nicely. Being from San Francisco and now a Scottsdale resident, I miss urban places. The decor is a bit edgy, the vibe is very urban chic and the crowd was wonderfully diverse.

name: Steak House at Desert Diamond Casino
review description: We have ( there are two of us ) eaten here before but never in the evening. We have never been disappointed with anything.The restaurant is well appointed; seating, tableware, glassware, locations.We might differ with the chef on his choice of vegetablesbut they came well prepared. The wine list is not extensive but their Agave house wine is more than acceptable and morethan reasonable. Their chardonnay is better than many wines costing twice as much. The service is excellent without beingoverbearing and with that we are comfortable.

name: The Steak Out
review description: Live music was great. Food was good but nothing special. Service was mediocre.

name: The Stockyards Restaurant & 1889 Saloon
review description: The experience was phenomenal! Great food, great service, and great atmosphere. Had a great time.

name: The Strand
address: 2 E. Jefferson St. Suite113 Phoenix, AZ  85004
review description: The food and atmosphere were great. The only bummer to the evening was our server who seemed a little lost mentally and was generally nowhere to be found. We had to get up and go ask for our bill and it was brought to us by another person from the restaurant. I would suggest the patio when there is a happening downtown. It's a great place to eat drink and people watch.

name: Sullivan's Steakhouse - Tucson
review description: Good Calmari, bread salad, and fillet. NY Strip very small. Onion rings presentation great but no onion flavor.

name: Sushi Roku - Scottsdale
review description: As always - FANTASTIC! The food is always outstanding, fresh and creative. I cannot say enough about Sushi Roku - it is worth every penny!

name: SWB - Hyatt Regency Scottsdale
address: 7500 E. Doubletree Ranch Rd. Scottsdale, AZ  58258
review description: I have been there before but it was prior to their remodeling a few years ago. I was disappointed in how casual the restaurant was. I guess I assumed it would be because of the prices. Pay for the ambiance, but that wasn't the case. We sat near the entrance and the open kitchen was to our left. During our breakfast we had the joy of listening to one of the cooks hammer out the potato fries. It was a continued hammering noise. Not at all enjoyable and it continually interrupted the conversation

name: T. Cook's @ The Royal Palms Resort
review description: A good spot for great food and service. Brunch at the T.Cook's is always relaxing and enjoyable!

name: Taggia at FireSky
review description: Great food at a great price. Beautiful place without being pretentious. Comfortable atmosphere!! Can't wait to go back

name: Talavera
address: 10600 E. Crescent Moon Drive Scottsdale, AZ  85262
review description: Unbeleivable food and ambiance!

name: Tanzy
address: 15257 North Scottsdale Road Suite F-230 Scottsdale, AZ  85254
review description: Service was outstanding. Food wasn't bad either.

name: Tapas Papa Frita
address: 7114 E. Stetson Dr. Suite 210 Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: We love Tapas Papa Frita! It's in our neighborhood downtown, so we walk over for a light snack during happy hour, or for a full dinner a little less often. The service is excellent - it has never been anything but perfect. Same with the food - Spanish, with a lot of Spanish wines. We are big fans of the seafood soup, the lamb chops, and the tomato salad. Highly recommended. A reservation is recommended on Fridays and Saturdays.

name: Tarbell's
review description: As usual the food and service at Tarbell's was outstanding.

name: Taste- An American Bistro at The Hilton Phoenix Chandler
review description: THEY DIDN'T KNOW HOW TO CHECK ME IN WITH OPEN TABLE, SO I'M SO HAPPY TO KNOW IT WAS ACCOMPLISHED THE FOLLOWING DAY.

name: Tavolino Ristorante
review description: The summer in Tucson is supposed be slow for restaurants. But NOT for Tavolino. The place was packed and "alive". The atmosphere and energy level were great. And, the food - as always - is incredible. Our favorite wine is from the family vineyard a Pietro Rinaldi Barbera - bricco. WOW. The homemade bread with a dip into the really good olive oil they use and a glass of wine are about all I needed to think I was in Italy. Great restaurant - glad to have it Tucson. The location is spectacular and close to home. Best of both !

name: Technique at Le Cordon Bleu – Scottsdale
review description: Food and service very good. Students do a fabulous job! The table setting is super.

name: Tequila Factory
review description: The evening started out well, our waitress, Krystal was helpful with the menu and even suggested drinks since it was our first time there. My girlfriend ordered a margarita, but she brought the wrong one. We ended up not having to pay for it but I did have to ask twice if she could bring the correct drink. When we received our food, we only had one set of silverware and when I asked Krystal for an extra set she said she would bring one. Well, if it hadn't been for another waitress stopping by to check on us I would have never eaten my food. It took the other girl 3 seconds to get another set of silverware and Krystal didn't check on us until AFTER we had already finished our food. I also had to ask for my check twice. Prob won't go back.

name: Thirsty Lion Pub & Grill
address: 2000 E Rio Salado Pkwy Suite 1041 Tempe, AZ  85281
review description: Incredible experience again. Food and service outstanding. It's no wonder Thirsty Lion is packed when other local eateries are not.I went for the second time this week and they were on a wait, ON A THURSDAY!Great music, looked to me that everyone was having a great time!The managers should be commended for having such a great staff, good looking too!

name: Tii Gavo, a gathering place at Enchantment Resort
review description: Excellent restaurant - loved the guacamole with chips - very good. Excellent prickly pear margarta's and you can't find a better view anywhere. All in all a great place.

name: Tomaso's - Phoenix
review description: Chef Lorenzo is by far one of the finest Italian chefs in the Phoenix area. If requested, he will vary any item on the menue to fit the taste of the customer. Also, the wait staff (Giovani, Dino, etc) is extremely professional. Everyone at Tomaso's takes pride in the food, the service and making certain that the customer is satisfied.

name: Tommy Bahama's Restaurant & Bar - Scottsdale
review description: We come back every year. We love to kick off our celebration of life (every year my mom is cancer free) at this restuarant. The staff welcomes us and we love the Sangria, the chicken and the desserts! Everything tastes great and the staff is over the top.

name: Tommy V's Urban Kitchen and Bar Scottsdale
address: 7303 E Indian School Rd. Scottsdale, AZ  85251
review description: Excellent food! Excellent service! It has become my favorite lunch spot for client meetings! Thank you, Tommy V's!

name: Tom's Tavern & 1929 Grill
address: 2 N. Central One Renaissance Sq Ste 102 Phoenix, AZ  85004
review description: We sat on the patio. I really enjoyed the brisket!!! Our waitress was very knowledgeable and attentive. We will return.

name: Top of the Rock Restaurant at the Marriott Buttes Resort
review description: The restaurant is easy to find. We appreciated the complimentary valet parking. All the staff in the restaurant was super friendly and inviting. The view for dinner was great. We had the whole outside seating to ourselves for most the night. Our waitress, LaVita, was excellent. We will definitely request to sit in her section the next time we visit. The food was scrumptious. We enjoyed the Atlantic salmon and roasted chicken entrees. The restaurant offers a wide variety of wines, beers, and specialty liquor drinks. It was a great place to spend our anniversary dinner.

name: Trophy's Steakhouse
address: 7215 S. Power Rd. Ste 107 Queen Creek, AZ  85142
review description: Funny you should ask. I was going to write you. Our reservations grew from 2 people to 9 people. It was a complete disaster.
